description:
This simple application is designed to replace the paper AR cards included with your new 3DS system.

Note:  This application is not affiliated with or endorsed by Nintendo.

Update 1.0.3 uses slightly different images.  This should greatly improve card recognition.  I was able to get it to recognize with both the Pre brightness at 100% and at 0%.  However, glare can be an issue at times.

Update 1.0.2 leaves the backlight on while the app is open.

Update 1.0.1 increases performance by drastically decreasing card resolution.
